data.name: MessageConfirmAnonymizeAllFiles
data.value: Would you like to anonymize *all* loaded files in addition to this one?

data.name: MessageConfirmDeleteSelectedTags
data.value: The selected tag(s) will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: MessageConfirmDeleteSelectedTagsFromAllFiles
data.value: Do you want to delete the selected tags from *all* the other loaded files in addition to the one selected?

data.name: MessageConfirmReplicateTagsInAllFiles
data.value:
The selected tag(s) and their values will be replicated in *all* loaded files. Are you sure you want to continue?
NOTE: This will not automatically save the files. You must still click the Save tool to save the files.

data.name: MessageConfirmRevert
data.value: The edits will be reverted to the last saved state. Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: MessageConfirmRevertAllFiles
data.value: Would you like to revert *all* loaded files in addition to this one?

data.name: MessageConfirmSaveAllFiles
data.value:
The changes will be saved to *all* loaded files and the original files will be overwritten. Are you sure you want to continue?
NOTE: If any of the edited files are open in the Study Filters, it should be closed. Otherwise, the edited values may appear unchanged.

data.name: MessageFailedDump
data.value: DICOM Dump operation failed. File(s) in selection may not be DICOM.

data.name: MessageAnonymizeStudyFailed
data.value: An error occurred while attempting to anonymize the study. Please check the logs for more details.

data.name: MessageNoTagsWereDeleted
data.value: No tags were deleted. This is often because the selection only contains Sequence Items, Sequence Delimiter Items, and Item Delimiter Items which cannot be deleted.

data.name: MessagePatientIdCannotBeEmpty
data.value: The patient Id cannot be empty.

data.name: MessagePatientsNameCannotBeEmpty
data.value: The patient's name cannot be empty.

data.name: MessagePleaseSelectAnImage
data.value: This tool is only valid when a DICOM Image is selected.

data.name: MessageTagCannotBeCreated
data.value: The tag cannot be created. Please ensure that the values are properly entered and are appropriate for the tag being created.

data.name: MessageUnknownDataSource
data.value: The source data is not in a format the Dicom Editor can understand.

data.name: TooltipReplicate
data.value: Replicates selected tag to all loaded files

data.name: TooltipSave
data.value: Save changes, overwriting the original files

data.name: MessageNoFilesSelected
data.value: DICOM Dump operation failed. The selected path did not contain any files.

data.name: MessageSequenceBinaryReplicationNotSupported
data.value: Replicating sequence and binary attributes is not supported.

data.name: MessageErrorUpdatingSomeFiles
data.value: There was an error saving one or more of the selected files. Please check the logs to make sure the indicated files are accessible and try again.

data.name: MessageAccessionNumberInvalidLength
data.value: The Accession Number must be between 0 and 16 characters.

data.name: MessageConfirmSaveSingleFile
data.value: The changes will be saved to the loaded file and the original file will be overwritten. Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: MessageConfirmSaveSingleRemoteFile
data.value: The changes will be saved to the loaded file and the original file will be overwritten. Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: MessageValueConflictsWithOriginal
data.value: The value conflicts with the original value.

data.name: MessageConfirmKeepReportsAndAttachments
data.value: Reports and other documents attached to a DICOM study often contain patient information that cannot be completely cleaned by this tool. Are you sure you want to keep these files?

data.name: MessageConfirmAnonymizeOneOrMoreReportsAndAttachments
data.value: One or more files being anonymized are reports and/or other documents. These often contain patient information that cannot be completely cleaned by this tool. Are you sure you want to continue anonymization?

data.name: MessageCannotAnonymizeMaxDiskUsageExceeded
data.value: The study cannot be anonymized because the maximum disk usage has been exceeded.

data.name: MessageConfirmAnonymizeReportOrAttachment
data.value: The file being anonymized is a report or other document. These often contain patient information that cannot be completely cleaned by this tool. Are you sure you want to continue anonymization?

data.name: MessageConfirmSaveReportOrAttachment
data.value: The edited file is a report and/or other document. If you have modified any patient information, this tool cannot modify the document to match your changes. Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: MessageConfirmSaveReportsOrAttachments
data.value: One or more of the edited files are reports and/or other documents. If you have modified any patient information, this tool cannot modify the document to match your changes. Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: MessageConfirmSaveChangesBeforeClosing
data.value: One or more files have been modified. Do you want to save the files now?

data.name: MessageFileStoreNotValidSaveLocation
data.value: Invalid destination. You cannot save directly to the file store. Please save to another directory, then import the file(s) from that location.

data.name: MessageOutputFolderNotEmptyConfirmOverwriteFiles
data.value: The selected directory is not empty. Any existing files with conflicting filenames will be overwritten. Do you wish to continue?
